job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>100% remote, Contract to Hire, W2 only</strong></p><p><br></p><p>The #1 online wine retail store desires passionate Site Reliability Engineers who are fascinated with improving the customer experience by helping them discover great wines from all over the world.</p><p><br></p><p>Envisioned yourself yourself joining the team? Cheers, innovators!</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Top Skills' Details</strong></p><ul><li>AWS Cloud – setting up cloud formations, security groups, cloud watch metrics</li><li>Terraform &amp; Kubernetes</li><li>Automation/CM with Ansible and Chef-Python Coding required</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities will include, but not be limited to:</strong></p><ul><li>Development of new applications and tools to automate key portions of our production infrastructure</li><li>Development of solutions for the automation of system provisioning and deployment</li><li>Research and implementation of new monitoring systems</li><li>Develop and deploy new tools for the automation of configuration management processes</li><li>Build internal tools for centralized infrastructure management</li></ul>
